# Data

```{python}
parabola = pd.DataFrame(np.arange(-20, 21), columns=list('x'))
parabola['err'] = np.random.normal(size=len(parabola), scale=5)
parabola['y'] = (parabola['x'] + parabola['err'])**2
print(parabola)
```

# Plot
